description: The trails included in this GPS file are Jaimee's Hairy, Jaimee's Loop, Jack's Switch Back and Specialized Mikes.The network includes tens of kilometers of other trails crossing the Nordic Ski Club trails.  The trails are well maintained and the leaves are blown in the fall. The trail signage is however incomplete.There is a vast network of Mountain Bike Trails on the north shore of Trout Lake near North Bay, Ontario.  Most trails are fairly technical and hilly, with rocky and rooty sections.  The network of trails can be accessed form the Nordic Ski Club or from a number of access points along North Shore Road.
directions: From North Bay, Ontario, head north on Trout Lake Road.  Turn right on Peninsula Road and then left on North Shore Road (2.4 km) to reach the Nordic Ski Club.  Continue another 2.5 km to reach the other access shown on this GPS file.
title: North Bay North Shore
